FORM_DINAR.DESCRIPCION_EVENTO_1: We invite you to our Mollerussa Metal Fest Solidarity Meal, a unique event that combines great metal music with solidarity gastronomy.
FORM_DINAR.DESCRIPCION_EVENTO_2: This special meal is organized by the Mollerussa Metal Fest association as part of our commitment to the community and metal culture.
FORM_DINAR.EXPERIENCIA_UNICA: Don't miss this unique experience of food and live metal!
FORM_DINAR.DONACION_DETALLE: Your contribution will help support research and treatment of childhood cancer
FORM_DINAR.PRECIO_CALCULADO: Price calculated based on your selection
FORM_DINAR.TERMINOS_TEXTO: I accept the terms and conditions. I understand that this reservation is subject to availability and confirmation by the organization.
FORM_DINAR.CAMPOS_OBLIGATORIOS: Please complete all mandatory fields correctly.
FORM_DINAR.ACEPTAR_TERMINOS: You must accept the terms and conditions and the privacy policy.
FORM_DINAR.SUMA_PLATOS_ERROR: The sum of dishes cannot be greater than the number of people.
